body:
I've done too many but I'm bored, I'll give serious awnsers.

I'm Sem,
I live in the Netherlands and I'm 1/2 Indonesian. I've been a part of this community for over 1.5 years now.
Most of you know me as an annoying, extremely bad troll with poor grammar, which is true, sadly.
Due to that I lost a few good friends on Avicus, I had great fun playing with you guys through the first year I joined this server.
I regret becoming such a dick, even after I made an apologize post I continued being stupid. Sorry for that.
I now pretty much lost interest in Avicus and MC in general, school has started and I need to focus on it.
You'll probaly only see me in-game when I'm playing a scrimmage with Apollo, only on weekends.

So yeah, ask me things. :)

title: [AMA] Sem

replies.body: Opinion about me ? <3
replies.body_tagged: Opinion about me ? <3

replies.body:
Adam, many people have told you but I'm going to tell you again. You're one of the nicest guys in this community.
We've been great friends for a while now and I have no reason to dislike you.

It's extremely annoying to play against you, you're smart and also really good at melee. I've always seen you as a decent defender but I never knew you played offence and that you were also good at it. In public games you somehow always managed to get atleast 1 monument every game and in scrimmages it's pretty much the same.

Pink Swedish meatball <3

replies.body:
Markus, you too are one of the nicest guys I have ever met. It's so much fun to play with you, you seem always happy and you are always up for a good laugh. You're redstone creations are the best even though I have no idea what it does. You and Buster are a great combi, when are you both going to stop denying that you are a not a couple?

You've improved a lot in making defences, you make good call outs, you never get mad and you're also above average at PvP. Probaly one of the best players on Apollo, if you want you can get easily on a higher team.

Amazing friend and good teammate, love you Markus.

replies.body:
Ay Sem,

opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged:
Ay Sem,

opinions on me?

replies.body:
You were really bad at pvp when I first fought you, now you pretty much beat me in every fight. You've improved a lot. I was honestly a bit suprised that you got on BC at first, quickly after that I realized how good you actually were. Probaly thought that because I hadn't played against you in a long time. In the first scrimmage you played against me you destroyed me. You deserved to get on a top tier team. :) When you were on Apollo you had great communication but you could get a bit heated and annoying sometimes, but that was fine since I was way more annoying. We became good buddies, we made some really bad jokes together. You can take things a bit too seriously though. You're nice and it's really fun to hang out with you. You're by far my favourite cheesehead <3

als ik skype heb moet je me een keertje toevoegen, heb een fijne avond.

replies.body:
1. Who is your hero?
  2. If you could live anywhere, where would it be?
  3. What is your biggest fear?
  4. What is your favorite family vacation?
  5. What would you change about yourself if you could?
  6. What really makes you angry?
  7. What motivates you to work hard?
  8. What is your favorite thing about your career?
  9. What is your biggest complaint about your job?
  10. What is your proudest accomplishment?
  11. What is your child's proudest accomplishment?
  12. What is your favorite book to read?
  13. What makes you laugh the most?
  14. What was the last movie you went to? What did you think?
  15. What did you want to be when you were small?
  16. What does your child want to be when he/she grows up?
  17. If you could choose to do anything for a day, what would it be?
  18. What is your favorite game or sport to watch and play?
  19. Would you rather ride a bike, ride a horse, or drive a car?
  20. What would you sing at Karaoke night?
  21. What two radio stations do you listen to in the car the most?
  22. Which would you rather do: wash dishes, mow the lawn, clean the bathroom, or vacuum the house?
  23. If you could hire someone to help you, would it be with cleaning, cooking, or yard work?
  24. If you could only eat one meal for the rest of your life, what would it be?
  25. Who is your favourite author?

   26. Have you ever had a nickname? What is it?
   27. Do you like or dislike surprises? Why or why not?
   28. In the evening, would you rather play a game, visit a relative, watch a movie, or read?
   29. Would you rather vacation in Hawaii or Alaska, and why?
   30. Would you rather win the lottery or work at the perfect job? And why?
   31. Who would you want to be stranded with on a deserted island?
   32. If money was no object, what would you do all day?
   33. If you could go back in time, what year would you travel to?
   34. How would your friends describe you?
   35. What are your hobbies?
   36. What is the best gift you have been given?
   37. What is the worst gift you have received?
   38. Aside from necessities, what one thing could you not go a day without?
   39. List two pet peeves.
   40. Where do you see yourself in five years?
   41. How many pairs of shoes do you own?
   42. If you were a super-hero, what powers would you have?
   43. What would you do if you won the lottery?
   44. What form of public transportation do you prefer? (air, boat, train, bus, car, etc.)
   45. What's your favorite zoo animal?
   46. If you could go back in time to change one thing, what would it be?
   47. If you could share a meal with any 4 individuals, living or dead, who would they be?
   48. How many pillows do you sleep with?
   49. What's the longest you've gone without sleep (and why)?
   50. What's the tallest building you've been to the top in?

   51. Would you rather trade intelligence for looks or looks for intelligence?
   52. How often do you buy clothes?
   53. Have you ever had a secret admirer?
   54. What's your favorite holiday?
   55. What's the most daring thing you've ever done?
   56. What was the last thing you recorded on TV?
   57. What was the last book you read?
   58. What's your favorite type of foreign food?
   59. Are you a clean or messy person?
   60. Who would you want to play you in a movie of your life?
   61. How long does it take you to get ready in the morning?
   62. What kitchen appliance do you use every day?
   63. What's your favorite fast food chain?
   64. What's your favorite family recipe?
   65. Do you love or hate rollercoasters?
   66. What's your favorite family tradition?
   67. What is your favorite childhood memory?
   68. What's your favorite movie?
   69. How old were you when you learned Santa wasn't real? How did you find out?
   70. Is your glass half full or half empty?
   71. What's the craziest thing you’ve done in the name of love?
   72. What three items would you take with you on a deserted island?
   73. What was your favorite subject in school?
   74. What's the most unusual thing you've ever eaten?
   75. Do you collect anything?

   76. Is there anything you wished would come back into fashion?
   77. Are you an introvert or an extrovert?
   78. Which of the five senses would you say is your strongest?
   79. Have you ever had a surprise party? (that was an actual surprise)
   80. Are you related or distantly related to anyone famous?
   81. What do you do to keep fit?
   82. Does your family have a “motto” – spoken or unspoken?
   83. If you were ruler of your own country what would be the first law you would introduce?
   84. Who was your favorite teacher in school and why?
   85. What three things do you think of the most each day?
   86. If you had a warning label, what would yours say?
   87. What song would you say best sums you up?
   88. What celebrity would you like to meet at Starbucks for a cup of coffee?
   89. Who was your first crush?

   90. What's the most interesting thing you can see out of your office or kitchen window?
   91. On a scale of 1-10 how funny would you say you are?
   92. Where do you see yourself in 10 years?
   93. What was your first job?
   94. If you could join any past or current music group which would you want to join?
   95. How many languages do you speak?
   96. What is your favourite family holiday tradition?
   97. Who is the most intelligent person you know?
   98. If you had to describe yourself as an animal, which one would it be?
   99. What is one thing you will never do again?
 100. Who knows you the best?

reply_to.body: opinion of moi?

replies.body:
Bringing this back up.

Hannah/Buster I think you're really nice, weird and fun to talk with. You're a great moral support and always in a happy mood. IMO you are actually pretty decent at pvp and good at crafting armor for us. :P We were friends before I didn't know you were a girl. I was so suprised when you told me you were a girl, probaly because of the name you had. It's really great to have someone like you in Apollo. :)

replies.body:
Didn't speak to you that much when before you joined Apollo. I thought 
you were a bit annoying but you probaly weren't. When I played against 
you in scrimmages I saw you as a normal avicus regular, good for Berzerk and nothing much more. TBH I was against you joining Apollo, I guess I got proven wrong. You make decent defences and you follow instructions very well. You have improved a lot, you're a valuable player for us. Now I think you aren't annoying anymore and actually really nice. Sometimes you need watch what you are saying in chat. (so do I) I like you Spookeh. :)

reply_to.body:
Didn't speak to you that much when before you joined Apollo. I thought 
you were a bit annoying but you probaly weren't. When I played against 
you in scrimmages I saw you as a normal avicus regular, good for Berzerk and nothing much more. TBH I was against you joining Apollo, I guess I got proven wrong. You make decent defences and you follow instructions very well. You have improved a lot, you're a valuable player for us. Now I think you aren't annoying anymore and actually really nice. Sometimes you need watch what you are saying in chat. (so do I) I like you Spookeh. :)

replies.body: Opinions on me? :P
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on me? :P

replies.body:
When I first heard your voice my ears almost started bleeding and I got close to a point of killing myself.
After having to listen to it for a while I got used to it, now it is quite satisfying to listen to. (atleast you got the balls to talk uhuh) You do a lot of great stuff for this community, you're mini tournaments are well organized and really fun to play. Thank you for keeping what is left of the competitive side of Avicus alive. You're great at melee and a good leader for a team. Other than that I think you're quite mature and you totally deserve to get Event Coordinator.
replies.body_tagged:

After having to listen to it for a while I got used to it, now it is quite satisfying to listen to. (atleast you got the balls to talk uhuh) You do a lot of great stuff for this community, you're mini tournaments are well organized and really fun to play. Thank you for keeping what is left of the competitive side of Avicus alive. You're great at melee and a good leader for a team. Other than that I think you're quite mature and you totally deserve to get Event Coordinator.

reply_to.body: Opinion on me?
reply_to.body_tagged: Opinion on me?

replies.body: I wanted to awnser them all but I got tired after question 5.
replies.body_tagged: I wanted to awnser them all but I got tired after question 5.

reply_to.body:
1. Who is your hero?
  2. If you could live anywhere, where would it be?
  3. What is your biggest fear?
  4. What is your favorite family vacation?
  5. What would you change about yourself if you could?
  6. What really makes you angry?
  7. What motivates you to work hard?
  8. What is your favorite thing about your career?
  9. What is your biggest complaint about your job?
  10. What is your proudest accomplishment?
  11. What is your child's proudest accomplishment?
  12. What is your favorite book to read?
  13. What makes you laugh the most?
  14. What was the last movie you went to? What did you think?
  15. What did you want to be when you were small?
  16. What does your child want to be when he/she grows up?
  17. If you could choose to do anything for a day, what would it be?
  18. What is your favorite game or sport to watch and play?
  19. Would you rather ride a bike, ride a horse, or drive a car?
  20. What would you sing at Karaoke night?
  21. What two radio stations do you listen to in the car the most?
  22. Which would you rather do: wash dishes, mow the lawn, clean the bathroom, or vacuum the house?
  23. If you could hire someone to help you, would it be with cleaning, cooking, or yard work?
  24. If you could only eat one meal for the rest of your life, what would it be?
  25. Who is your favourite author?

   26. Have you ever had a nickname? What is it?
   27. Do you like or dislike surprises? Why or why not?
   28. In the evening, would you rather play a game, visit a relative, watch a movie, or read?
   29. Would you rather vacation in Hawaii or Alaska, and why?
   30. Would you rather win the lottery or work at the perfect job? And why?
   31. Who would you want to be stranded with on a deserted island?
   32. If money was no object, what would you do all day?
   33. If you could go back in time, what year would you travel to?
   34. How would your friends describe you?
   35. What are your hobbies?
   36. What is the best gift you have been given?
   37. What is the worst gift you have received?
   38. Aside from necessities, what one thing could you not go a day without?
   39. List two pet peeves.
   40. Where do you see yourself in five years?
   41. How many pairs of shoes do you own?
   42. If you were a super-hero, what powers would you have?
   43. What would you do if you won the lottery?
   44. What form of public transportation do you prefer? (air, boat, train, bus, car, etc.)
   45. What's your favorite zoo animal?
   46. If you could go back in time to change one thing, what would it be?
   47. If you could share a meal with any 4 individuals, living or dead, who would they be?
   48. How many pillows do you sleep with?
   49. What's the longest you've gone without sleep (and why)?
   50. What's the tallest building you've been to the top in?

   51. Would you rather trade intelligence for looks or looks for intelligence?
   52. How often do you buy clothes?
   53. Have you ever had a secret admirer?
   54. What's your favorite holiday?
   55. What's the most daring thing you've ever done?
   56. What was the last thing you recorded on TV?
   57. What was the last book you read?
   58. What's your favorite type of foreign food?
   59. Are you a clean or messy person?
   60. Who would you want to play you in a movie of your life?
   61. How long does it take you to get ready in the morning?
   62. What kitchen appliance do you use every day?
   63. What's your favorite fast food chain?
   64. What's your favorite family recipe?
   65. Do you love or hate rollercoasters?
   66. What's your favorite family tradition?
   67. What is your favorite childhood memory?
   68. What's your favorite movie?
   69. How old were you when you learned Santa wasn't real? How did you find out?
   70. Is your glass half full or half empty?
   71. What's the craziest thing you’ve done in the name of love?
   72. What three items would you take with you on a deserted island?
   73. What was your favorite subject in school?
   74. What's the most unusual thing you've ever eaten?
   75. Do you collect anything?

   76. Is there anything you wished would come back into fashion?
   77. Are you an introvert or an extrovert?
   78. Which of the five senses would you say is your strongest?
   79. Have you ever had a surprise party? (that was an actual surprise)
   80. Are you related or distantly related to anyone famous?
   81. What do you do to keep fit?
   82. Does your family have a “motto” – spoken or unspoken?
   83. If you were ruler of your own country what would be the first law you would introduce?
   84. Who was your favorite teacher in school and why?
   85. What three things do you think of the most each day?
   86. If you had a warning label, what would yours say?
   87. What song would you say best sums you up?
   88. What celebrity would you like to meet at Starbucks for a cup of coffee?
   89. Who was your first crush?

   90. What's the most interesting thing you can see out of your office or kitchen window?
   91. On a scale of 1-10 how funny would you say you are?
   92. Where do you see yourself in 10 years?
   93. What was your first job?
   94. If you could join any past or current music group which would you want to join?
   95. How many languages do you speak?
   96. What is your favourite family holiday tradition?
   97. Who is the most intelligent person you know?
   98. If you had to describe yourself as an animal, which one would it be?
   99. What is one thing you will never do again?
 100. Who knows you the best?

replies.body:
Imma just awnser a few questions in one post.

@Smitdalt - yes
@bisa whatever your name is - I tried to learn Indonesian but I only know a few words ex: bus
@DaFrozenBlaze - Buster and probaly Legoche, we don't know his gender.
@Legoche - get out
@OsamaBinBanging - Don't really know where my "fam" is from, all I know most of them live in a small town.
My favourite Indonesian food has to be Nasi Goreng, yes it's very basic but it tastes so great.

replies.body:
I get so frustated and irritated when I have to play against you, even more than playing against Zero or Kiwi. You're amazing at melee and I really hope you're legit. I'm glad you chose for Apollo.  If I had to compare myself to someone with the same kind of playstyle it would be you. Being stubborn. <3

 As a person I think you are one of the nicest guys on Avicus, you're like the male version of Buster. You always stay calm and I think I've never seen you heated. I think your name is Dan. Dan you are a great human and I'd put you in my curry.

reply_to.body: Opinions on me? :P

replies.body:
Q. Opinion on me?
A. Look at page 1 Bartie.
Q. Why do you stay on Avicus?
A. Simple awnser, tournament and scrimmages. I don't play public.
Q. Fav gamemode?
A. CTW
Q. Bow or sword?
A. Bow, whenever I try to melee PvP someone my fps drops like crazy.
